Class MergeSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • MergeSort

  • public class MergeSort
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    1.0 Handles most behaviors for the merge sort.
    Author:
    David Hausken

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] arrayToSort
      Array of integers of size 100 to be assigned random values.

    • Field Detail

      • arrayToSort

        private final int[] arrayToSort
        Array of integers of size 100 to be assigned random values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MergeSort

        public MergeSort()
        MergeSort constructor. Assigns random values to each index of the arrayToSort.

    • Method Detail

      • sortArray

        public void sortArray(int low,
                      int high)
        Sort method for the merge sort. Uses recursion to go through the values and merges the indexes at the end.
        Parameters:
        low - Lower element
        high - Higher element

      • merge

        private void merge(int left,
                   int right)
        Merge two subarrays into a single sorted array.
        Parameters:
        left - Left subarray
        right - Right subarray

        Prints all values in the array toSort array.
